head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MAYERSON, MANUEL D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MAYERSON, MANUEL D.

block.p: MAYERSON--Manuel D., 89, of Dayton, OH, died December 31, 2006. Preceded in death by wife Florence and grandson Noam. Survived by son Harvey (Gila) Mayerson, daughter Lynn Mayerson Berger (Shlomo), all of Israel, daughter Sandy Mayerson of NY, loving grandchildren, brothers, and other family. Funeral service held in Dayton. Donations to Beth Jacob Synagogue, Dayton, OH.
